description: This file defines API endpoints for user management in a FastAPI application. It includes route handlers for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting users, all orchestrated via a UsersService that interacts with a MongoDB database. The file specifies route metadata, dependency injection, and API documentation details.

methods.name: get_users_service
methods.description: Provides a UsersService instance configured with a MongoDB database for dependency injection within FastAPI routes.

methods.name: list_users
methods.description: API endpoint handler that returns a list of users with pagination support.

methods.name: get_user
methods.description: API endpoint handler to retrieve a single user by ID.

methods.name: create_user
methods.description: API endpoint handler to create a new user based on provided payload.

methods.name: update_user
methods.description: API endpoint handler to update an existing user's details.

methods.name: delete_user
methods.description: API endpoint handler to delete a user by ID.
